name: CreatingReminders
0:
”Alexa open drink water.”
”Alexa launch drink water”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drink water
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Create reminder for drinking water. 
Alexa will remind you after an hour to drink water.

Say Alexa "Open Drink Water " to start the skill.

You can stop Alexa any time saying "Alexa Stop".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
